name: Escargot
description: Garden snails cooked in a sauce of butter, garlic, and parsley.

name: Cassoulet
description: A traditional dish from the Languedoc region, consisting of beans with pork, sausages, and other types of meat.

name: Crème Brûlée
description: A French dessert with vanilla custard topped with a thin layer of caramelized sugar.
